item.title: Pixelverse Launches Arcade on Base and Farcaster, Hits 27M Monthly Users
item.description: The Web3 gaming platform Pixelverse, which announced the debut of Pixelverse Arcade on Base and Farcaster, has risen to 27 million monthly active users (MAU) with its Telegram tap-to-earn feature. The change is a reflection of Pixelverse’s transition from a Telegram-native audience to a community that is more focused on Web3.
